text: [Exclusive](/en/news/an-elderly-woman-who-had-been-transported-to-the-hospital-for-a-long-time-on-a-road-broken-by-agricultural-companies-died) An elderly woman who had been transported to the hospital for a long time on a road broken by agricultural companies died [Exclusive](/en/news/an-ambulance-barely-brought-a-seriously-ill-grandmother-to-the-hospital-on-the-road-destroyed-by-two-well-known-agricultural-companies-video) "An ambulance barely brought a seriously ill grandmother to the hospital on the road destroyed by two well-known agricultural companies (video) [Exclusive](/en/news/instead-of-obtaining-travel-permits-the-commercial-entity-sued-the-opp) Instead of obtaining travel permits, the commercial entity sued the OPP [Exclusive](/en/news/mp-the-conflict-over-the-olympex-grain-terminal-may-increase-the-risk-of-ukraine-for-foreign-investors) MP: The conflict over the Olympex grain terminal may increase the risk of Ukraine for foreign investors [Exclusive](/en/news/solskys-case-stategeocadastre-comments-on-land-allocation-to-ato-soldiers) "Solsky's case: StateGeoCadastre comments on land allocation to ATO soldiers Biden likely to skip World Summit to raise campaign funds - Bloomberg [Exclusive](/en/news/mps-criticize-the-idea-of-a-lottery-for-mobilization-reservations-as-nonsense) "Complete nonsense": The Committee on National Security of the Council criticized Hetmantsev's idea to play armor against mobilization in a lottery [Exclusive](/en/news/we-are-open-to-cooperation-but-our-opponents-are-disrupting-the-work-of-the-grain-corridor-and-jeopardizing-the-countrys-defense-capability-odesa-port-plant) We are open to cooperation, but our opponents are disrupting the work of the grain corridor and jeopardizing the country's defense capability - Odesa Port Plant [Exclusive](/en/news/russia-is-trying-to-block-the-grain-corridor-through-sanctioned-alperin-and-his-friends) russia is trying to block the grain corridor through sanctioned Alperin and his friends [Exclusive](/en/news/experience-and-knowledge-the-expert-told-why-the-experts-of-the-kyiv-scientific-research-institute-of-forensic-expertise-should-be-involved-in-the-formation-of-the-register-of-tobacco-production-equipment) Experience and knowledge: the expert told why the experts of the Kyiv Scientific Research Institute of Forensic Expertise should be involved in the formation of the Register of Tobacco Production Equipment Three Christian missionaries killed in gang attack in Haiti Kharkiv suffered enemy attacks: a partially destroyed lyceum, a high-rise building, and several cars were damaged Occupation forces advance in Arkhangelske, Uman and Klishchiyivka - Odesa Port Plant We are open to cooperation, but our opponents are disrupting the work of the grain corridor and jeopardizing the country's defense capability - Odesa Port PlantExclusive russia is trying to block the grain corridor through sanctioned Alperin and his friends russia is trying to block the grain corridor through sanctioned Alperin and his friendsExclusive Ukraine needs foreign investors more than ever. Are we doing enough? Groza and Naumenko's company GNT Group has blocked the operation of a grain terminal in Odessa. Detailed chronology of the conflict The death of Iran's president: who was Raisi and what is known about his successor Three Christian missionaries killed in gang attack in Haiti Three Christian missionaries from a group based in Oklahoma were brutally murdered during a gang attack on their home in Haiti. Kharkiv suffered enemy attacks: a partially destroyed lyceum, a high-rise building, and several cars were damaged In Kharkiv, a partially destroyed lyceum, a multi-storey building, and several cars were damaged as a result of enemy aggression, the mayor of the city said. Occupation forces advance in Arkhangelske, Uman and Klishchiyivka - DeepState Enemy troops advanced in the vicinity of Arkhangelske, Umanske and Klishchiyivka. Fighting continues near Berestove, Ivanivka, Krasnohorivka and in Vovchansk Ukraine's women's wrestling team wins U23 European Championship The Ukrainian women's freestyle wrestling team won the U23 European Championships in Baku, winning 4 gold, 2 silver and 1 bronze medals. Over the day, Russia launched 2 missile strikes and 33 air attacks, using 224 kamikaze drones Over the past 24 hours, Russian occupants carried out 2 missile strikes, 33 air strikes, used 224 kamikaze drones, and shelled more than 2,200 military positions and settlements, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reports. Explosions occurred in Kharkiv again A series of explosions occurred in Kharkiv, according to the city's mayor, Igor Terekhov. Explosions in Kharkiv, mayor calls for caution The explosion in Kharkiv was reported by Mayor Igor Terekhov, who urged residents to be careful. Threat of ballistic missiles detected in air alert areas The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine warns of the potential threat of ballistic missiles in air alert areas. Germany officially confirms transfer of IRIS-T air defense system to Ukraine Germany has supplied Ukraine with a new IRIS-T air defense system, strengthening its defense capabilities against Russian threats. Sumy region: russian troops shell the border areas of the region, 204 explosions recorded During the day, the occupiers fired 31 times at the border areas and settlements of Sumy region, resulting in 204 explosions in different localities.
